WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,

This is a very powerfull app and I am impressed the way it is working smoothly. I was trying to check it with my project but I observed that it is not downloading the contents of an file if it contains XML. I tried to search on google why it is happening, but unable to get any solution.

Can you help me out?
WorkItem.Summary: Why it is not downloading files having XML content?

Comments.Message: can you help me understand it. How can i use it in my project please i need help. i wanna use it but need help
can you help me understand it. How can i use it in my project please i need help. i wanna use it but need help
